promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young epic bison fire-type wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name, nothing else:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Flamestone, a chibi young epic bison fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: fire-spin. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word bison or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, bison-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Flamestone is a fiery bundle of energy! It loves to bask in the sun & play in desert heat. Its flames sear up a whirlwind of fun!
